Summary Note:
The RM first met Margaux Flore Renault at a luxury car show in Paris. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.

Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.

Education Background:
In 2013, Margaux graduated from Lycée René Descartes with a secondary school diploma.
Margaux completed her university education at École Normale Supérieure (ENS) Paris in 2018.
Occupation History:
Margaux Flore Renault is a 30 year old and comes from France.
Margaux Flore Renault launched her career as a Research Scientist at Sanofi S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2018 to 2021.
Her subsequent role was as a Clinical Trials Manager at Ipsen S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 2022 till now.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 30000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has condo located in Nantes, worth 1660000 EUR.

Client Summary: In summary, Margaux has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
